Mike Halunen

Thanks

August 08, 2013

Every once in a while, I get this urge to send a mass email to the various people from whom I’ve learned something over the years. It would be a huge list, really. But most people wouldn’t have the faintest idea that they even helped me. In fact, most of them probably don’t know who I am. But I know who they are. Maybe not personally. But I know them from their code. And they taught me so much.

Maybe we should treat our code as a teaching tool. Everybody would win.
